title: Looking for ARAM players
body:
So, I'm looking for people to play ARAM with to help re-level my brothers account since rito refuse to hand back over his confirmed stolen/hijacked account. He still semi new so looking for people game enough to teach him while we play. 
(Because it's okay to steal an account, just not okay to give so much evidence that it was hijacked)

You can add me, or you can add him once I get him back onto the forums.

replies.body: Add me mate I play more arams than anything J0NESY (the o is a zero)
